title: Building Production-Ready ML Pipelines
description: Discussed best practices for deploying machine learning models in production environments with real-time data.

title: Scaling Data Science with Python
description: Explored techniques for scaling data science workflows using Python, focusing on distributed computing and optimization.

title: From Data to Insights: A Practical Guide
description: Hands-on workshop on transforming raw data into actionable insights using modern data science tools.

title: Career Paths in AI/ML Engineering
description: Shared insights about career opportunities and skill requirements in the AI/ML industry with computer science students.

title: MLOps: Deploying Models at Scale
description: Online session covering MLOps practices, model versioning, and deployment strategies for enterprise applications.
